tool_description: Validates order parameters against venue-specific rules and regulatory requirements before submission.

quantity.description: Order quantity in shares or units

order_type.description: Order type: market, limit, stop, stop_limit

time_in_force.description: Time in force: day, gtc, ioc, fok

error_messages: Invalid symbol: Symbol not tradeable on specified venue or format incorrect.
Invalid quantity: Quantity must be positive and meet minimum lot size requirements.
Invalid price: Price must be within venue tick size rules and circuit breaker limits.
Invalid order type: Order type not supported by venue or incompatible with other parameters.
Invalid side: Side must be 'buy' or 'sell'.
Invalid time in force: Time in force not supported by venue for this order type.
usage: Provide all required order parameters to validate against venue rules. Price is required for limit and stop_limit orders.

validation_status.description: Validation result: passed, failed, or warning

error_codes.description: List of validation error codes if validation failed

warnings.description: List of validation warnings that don't prevent order submission
